description: doc: remove mention of weekly tag from source install doc

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg

LGTM On Sun, Jul 29, 2012 at 9:48 PM, wrote: > Reviewers: golang-dev_googlegroups.com, > > Message: > Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com, > > I'd like you to review this change to > https://go.googlecode.com/hg > > > Description: > doc: remove mention of weekly tag from source install doc > > Please review this at http://codereview.appspot.com/**6442062/ > > Affected files: > M doc/install-source.html > > > Index: doc/install-source.html > ==============================**==============================**======= > --- a/doc/install-source.html > +++ b/doc/install-source.html > @@ -247,8 +247,8 @@ >

Keeping up with releases

> >

> -The Go project maintains two stable tags in its Mercurial repository: > -release and weekly. > +The Go project maintains a stable tag in its Mercurial repository: > +release. >

> >

> @@ -269,12 +269,6 @@ > $ ./all.bash > > > -

> -The weekly tag is updated about once a week, and should be > used > -only by those who are actively working on the Go core. > -To use the weekly tag run hg update weekly > instead. > -

> - > >

Optional environment variables

> > > >

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=8c4b1b7ce761 ***

doc: remove mention of weekly tag from source install doc
